rows.label: tlk41100221_03_msg0002
rows.name:
When I see a rare bug, I just have to
chase it out of town, even if I know
it's dangerous.

rows.label: tlk41100221_03_msg0003
rows.name:
It's like my feet just start moving on their own,
drifting towards where the bugs are...

rows.label: tlk41100221_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And then I just unconsciously start
rummaging through the grass looking for them.
You get it, right?

rows.label: tlk41100221_01_msg0005
rows.name:
But, but! I can't cause trouble for you again,
so I'm trying to hold back my excitement.
